item.title: VSCode shortcuts
item.author: Author
item.description: MacOS Description Windows Cmd + Opt + down/up Add more cursor Cmd + Shift + p Open command palette Cmd + k v Preview markdown Ctrl + b Toggle Primary panel Cmd + Shift + b Toggle Secondary panel Cmd + j Toggle command panel Cmd + Shift + e Open Explorer view Cmd + Shift + f/h Open Search/Replace view Ctrl + Shift + g + g Open Source Control view Cmd + Shift + x Open Extensions view Key Description Ctrl+Shift+p show the command palette Ctrl+Shift+l Add cursors to all matching selections Ctrl+d Add cursor to next matching selection Ctrl+u Undo last cursor operation Ctrl+l Select the current line in the cursor.
